name: Space Control (itch)
description:
Control everything in your spaceship from oxygen levels to its weight to travel the furthest distance possible.

If you run out of fuel, your player becomes unhappy or the engine overheats you lose. Do everything you can to travel the longest distance. The further you travel, the more coins you get and the more supplies you can afford, thus the longer you will survive.

How long will you last in Space Control…
